text: Luciano Zampatti was an Italian ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1928 Winter Olympics. He also finished second in the 1934 Italian ski jumping championships. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Italy Category:Ski jumpers at the 1928 Winter Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Luciano Zampatti
